text: Michigan's Glenn Robinson III surprises, wins NBA slam dunk contest Former Wolverine makes statement on national stage with victory in somewhat underwhelming slam dunk competition Post to Facebook Michigan's Glenn Robinson III surprises, wins NBA slam dunk contest Former Wolverine makes statement on national stage with victory in somewhat underwhelming slam dunk competition  //on.freep.com/2lvDyB9   Join the Conversation To   Michigan's Glenn Robinson III surprises, wins NBA slam dunk contest By Chris Nelsen, Special to Detroit Free Press 12:48 a.m. ET Feb. 19, 2017 Facebook Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Indiana Pacers forward Glenn Robinson III celebrates winning the slam dunk contest during NBA All-Star Saturday Night at Smoothie King Center.
